headline: Carvana, Netflix, Duolingo, Robinhood, and Chegg Shares Plummet, What You Need To Know
summary: A number of stocks fell in the afternoon session after investor apprehension intensified ahead of a key policy speech and perplexing inflation signals clouded the economic outlook, leading to a wider market retreat from growth-oriented stocks.

headline: The Crypto Bull Run Is Far From Over, Bernstein Predicts
summary: In their latest report, Bernstein is predicting a crypto bull market run into 2027 with bitcoin potentially soaring to $200,000 in the next year. The Wall Street firm also sees Robinhood, Coinbase, and Circle positioned to benefit from this extended rally. CoinDesk's Jenn Sanasie unpacks key takeaways from the report in today's "Chart of the Day," presented by Crypto.com.

The Wall Street firm also sees Robinhood, Coinbase, and Circle positioned to benefit from this extended rally. CoinDesk's Jenn Sanasie unpacks key takeaways from the report in today's "Chart of the Day," presented by Crypto.com.

headline: Cathie Wood’s ARK Innovation Sees Outflows, But Buys More Deere Stock Anyway
summary: Cathie Wood’s ARK Innovation exchange-traded fund is having quite a year, which might be leading investors to take some profits.  Bloomberg reported there were fund outflows of $2.7 billion for the technology-heavy ETF on Monday alone, the “most in at least a year.”  ARK Invest didn’t immediately respond to a request for comment.
